onPrimaryClipChanged().Description: Callback that is invoked by @B_android#content#ClipboardManager_E@ when the primary clip changes.

ClassDesc: Defines a listener callback that is invoked when the primary clip on the clipboard changes. Objects that want to register a listener call @B_android#content#ClipboardManager#addPrimaryClipChangedListener_E@ with an object that implements OnPrimaryClipChangedListener.
